title: Lava Dragon Isle

The landscape is even more charred than the wilderness around it, and dragon eggs sit on the ground in various spots. content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Red Dragon IsleThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Red Dragon Isle
Lava Dragon Isle
Released27 February 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationWilderness
Wilderness level36-42
Map

Lava Dragon Isle is a members only location that stretches from level 36 to level 42 Wilderness. It is a multi-combat area and is home to several lava dragons. The landscape is even more charred than the wilderness around it, and dragon eggs sit on the ground in various spots. Killing the lava dragons and collecting their drops can be very profitable, making this area a hotspot for both money makers and PKers. Burying lava dragon bones on Lava Dragon Isle grants 340 prayer experience instead of the normal 85 experience.

However, there are safespots if players wish to train on the dragons using ranged attacks or Magic attacks or with a halberd, and there are white berries there that respawn very quickly, which players may collect and sell for a decent profit. An Anti-dragon shield is a must if players wish to visit this deadly part of the wilderness.

A shortcut at the bottom of the isle can be found, requiring 74 Agility and completion of the Wilderness hard diary to use. This can be great when needing to escape from PKers when fighting inside the isle if they cannot use it.

William can be found near the entrance selling Team capes 1, 11, 21, 31, and 41.

Spawns[edit | edit source]

  • White berries
  • Burnt bones
  • Black dagger
  • Vial
  • 5 coins

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

There is now a shortcut on the south side to Lava Dragon Isle that you can use at level 74 agility if you have completed the Wilderness Hard Diary.

13 March 2014
(update | poll)

The red dragons inhabiting the isle, which was previously known as Red Dragon Isle, have been replaced with lava dragons.

'''Lava Dragon Isle''' is a members only location that stretches from level 36 to level 42 [[Wilderness]]. It is a multi-combat area and is home to several [[lava dragon]]s. The landscape is even more charred than the wilderness around it, and dragon eggs sit on the ground in various spots. Killing the lava dragons and collecting their drops can be very profitable, making this area a hotspot for both money makers and PKers.  Burying lava dragon bones on Lava Dragon Isle grants 340 prayer experience instead of the normal 85 experience.

However, there are safespots if players wish to train on the dragons using [[ranged]] attacks or Magic attacks or with a halberd, and there are [[white berries]] there that respawn very quickly, which players may collect and sell for a decent profit. An [[Anti-dragon shield]] is a must if players wish to visit this deadly part of the wilderness.

A shortcut at the bottom of the isle can be found, requiring 74 [[Agility]] and completion of the [[Wilderness Diary#Hard|Wilderness hard diary]] to use. This can be great when needing to escape from PKers when fighting inside the isle if they cannot use it.

[[William]] can be found near the entrance selling [[Team cape]]s 1, 11, 21, 31, and 41.

*[[White berries]]
*[[Burnt bones]]
*[[Black dagger]]
*[[Vial]]
*5 [[coins]]
